info.title: Schema of Azure App Configuration events published to Azure Event Grid
info.description: Describes the schema of the Azure App Configuration events published to Azure Event Grid. This corresponds to the Data property of an EventGridEvent.

AppConfigurationKeyValueModifiedEventDat.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.AppConfiguration.KeyValueModified event.

key.description: The key used to identify the key-value that was modified.

label.description: The label, if any, used to identify the key-value that was modified.

etag.description: The etag representing the new state of the key-value.

syncToken.description: The sync token representing the server state after the event.

AppConfigurationKeyValueDeletedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.AppConfiguration.KeyValueDeleted event.

key.description: The key used to identify the key-value that was deleted.

label.description: The label, if any, used to identify the key-value that was deleted.

etag.description: The etag representing the key-value that was deleted.

syncToken.description: The sync token representing the server state after the event.

AppConfigurationSnapshotEventData.description: Schema of common properties of snapshot events

etag.description: The etag representing the new state of the snapshot.

syncToken.description: The sync token representing the server state after the event.

AppConfigurationSnapshotCreatedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.AppConfiguration.SnapshotCreated event.

AppConfigurationSnapshotModifiedEventDat.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.AppConfiguration.SnapshotModified event.
